name: Dungeon Defender Revenger (DDR)
description:
DDR with a dungeon twist!

Slash, jab, and block through hordes of enemies! The game speeds up after time, so whatever you do...

Don't let anything pass!

Simple Controls.

Attack          ->  Arrow Keys, WASD

Restart Game    ->  R

Made with 10 lines of code.

This game was a challenge to see what I could make with 10 lines of code in the Godot game engine.

YouTube video on the making of Dungeon Defender Revenger coming soon!
